name: Zafe's Adventures
storyline: Zafe (that's practically a weird name) is a young, heroic, but mistaking humanoid cosmic creature with a pyrokinetic abilities who find that the evil forces known as Zupkabyum (still another wacky name) overrun the hillside forest land when he doing jogging outside. He must try to uncover the causes of the mysterious presence in this area before he can stop them. However, he also seems to be curious and he ends up on more than a short journey when a portal mysteriously comes out of nowhere, he manages to get through his tedious adventures with many worlds he entered in order to return back to his home and finish everything.
summary: Zafe's Adventures is a new and simplified 2D platformer game with a simple run and gun elements and gameplay. Inspired by abandonware platformer, Sonic the Hedgehog series and its fangame, Spark the Electric Jester, Jazz Jackrabbit and Freedom Planet and as well with other simple 2D game that was made using GameMaker or Scratch in the past. This has been considered as a small solo indie game project only. The game follows a young and heroic pyrokinetic cartoon humanoid who tries to fight back against evil entities around the hillside wilderness. While he ends up on a long journey through another different world via the mysterious dimension portal.
